channel.title: How do I add another button here?
channel.description: Ok In my client want to add another button for some extra info for players and other stuff if you dont know what I mean here is a pic [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/jhzoz8.jpg[/img] I want to add a button where the red circle is if anyone knows how to do this can tell me or add me on skype? joseph.wilkins4

item.title: How do I add another button here?
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Tutorial:

There are two methods you are going to want to find: drawSideIcons and drawRedStones. (Or something like that) If it still does not load the sprite from your cache, you are going to have to force it to load server sided. I do believe there is one more method client sided that requires editing (actually handles loading up the interface), but I can’t remember what it is at the moment.

Okay, Ill look around my base for that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add another button here?

item.title: How do I add another button here?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

There are two methods you are going to want to find: drawSideIcons and drawRedStones. (Or something like that) If it still does not load the sprite from your cache, you are going to have to force it to load server sided. I do believe there is one more method client sided that requires editing (actually handles loading up the interface), but I can’t remember what it is at the moment.
